name: Flora Gorgeous Gardenia Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family: Florals..Scent Type: Fruity Floral..Key Notes: Pear, White Gardenia, Brown Sugar..Fragrance Description: Evolving into a new delicious Eau de Parfum, floral yet delicately sweet, Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia relaunches in a new campaign filled with flowers and fluffy animals. A signature floral scent for all free-spirited women full of positive energy...About the Fragrance: Taking inspiration from this legend and the idea of its mystical power, the gorgeous White Gardenia note is blended with solar Jasmine Grandiflorum absolute. This delicious potion of joy is introduced by a cheerful Pear Blossom accord while a touch of Brown Sugar accord adds a delicate sweetness to its scent trail.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum/Fragrance, Aqua/Water/Eau, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Coumarin, Linalool, Farnesol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent.

shades.shade_name: 1 oz / 30 ml eau de parfum spray
1.6 oz / 50 ml eau de parfum spray
3.3 oz / 100 ml eau de parfum spray

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this fragrance. It is such an amazing floral scent that lasts a good while and is easily layer-able with body mists. Gucci Gorgeous Gardenia is just a great floral scent that doesn't come off as being too mature or too juvenile. Overall, this is a must-have in any perfume collection, especially if you enjoy florals!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this scent. Fresh, clean, happy smells with a bit of proper musk to it. This is one perfume that does last so I'm not sure why there are so many reviews about it not lasting. Regardless, you will get used to any smell after a few minutes so that doesn't make sense unless you're wanting to smell like a perfume cap for 24 hours (which isn't healthy). Also, your PH matters for how the scent carries and lasts so its different for every single person. Either way LOVE this one :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia is an absolute dream in a bottle! The sweet, floral notes are perfectly balancedu2014soft yet captivating. Iu2019ve lost count of how many compliments Iu2019ve gotten while wearing it. Legally, I think Iu2019m obligated to say Iu2019m never, ever going to stop using it. Itu2019s my signature scent for life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this ,it doesn't last long for me so I use a layer scent...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing smell! I bought this perfume for my mother for her birthday and she loved it! It had an amazing smell

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love!!! This is a light and airy scent with floral notes. It does not have a strong scent but lingers through my day. Still using a year later.
Disappointed,  fragrance didn't last long. Not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent!!!! But goes away as soon as you spray it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smellu2026 but it does not last long at all. Not worth the money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful everyday scent that is a nice sweet floral, not too strong, so it can be layered easily. It lasts a long time for me,  it might not last long for others if they're not putting it on their pulse points and you're only spraying on your clothes, or it probably just doesn't go with your body chemistry. 10/10 every time for me.

Loved this perfume when I was in the store. They didn't have the mini size so I purchased the one that was $165. Smells amazing but after using it I realized that the smell only lasts for a few minutes. Not worth it at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this smell. It's amazing and lasts about 4- 5 hours . Gonna buy it again and again

reviews.review_title: My daily for a bottle, but may try others
reviews.review_text: I purchased the sample size in Sephora Favorites and chose it for the full size bottle you get. I made this my signature, daily scent. It's floral and clean. Great for day or night, warm or cold weather. And great for daily use, whether to go to work or to a special event.   I really love it, I love smelling myself. But TBH, I really like a fragrance that I love to smell and also gets compliments. No one has complimented me on this. Also, I feel like the sillage is kind of so-so. Goes strong for a few hours and then it's gone.   I've just about finished the fill size bottle and I think I'm going to keep searching my my signature scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love every Gucci smell Iu2019ve tried. This one is at the top of smells but I just sprayed it 10 minutes ago and I can barely smell it already. I wish it stayed because itu2019s amazing.

reviews.review_title: Addictive smell, but doesnu2019t stay on long.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in LOVE with this smell. I have never worn parfum in my life, I usually donu2019t like womenu2019s parfum smells. This one I canu2019t stop using. Perfect if you like more fruity smells. I hate leaving 4 stars, but I do have to say, you have to reapply it a lot. It just doesnu2019t stay very long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a go-to scent for me and I reordered the travel size. When I got my Sephora order in the mail the entire box smelled like this. I didnu2019t notice until later but the spray bottle was completely empty; it had all spilled out before it even got to me. Not sure if this is a new design flaw or just happened to be this order but super disappointing. had all

reviews.review_title: Intoxicating scent but longevity not the best
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the scent of this perfume. It is subtle but intoxicating! It is the perfect scent for someone who loves perfume but doesnu2019t want anything too intense. Gardenia and the Orchid are my two favourite scents in the collection, however I wish I purchased Orchid (the yellow one) instead as when I sampled the two, Orchid lasted MUCH longer on the skin. Love this one but the longevity is not as great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the scent, I just wish it stayed on. Not long lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love the smell but unfortunately I wonu2019t repurchase just because it doesnu2019t last at all :(
Smell wonderful but the smell doesnu2019t last long at all

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful perfume, not very long lasting though, I'd say it stays on the skin for a couple hours

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving the fragrance on me my family appreciated it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just like some of the other comments mentioned, the scent is great I really love it but the scent disappears so quickly . Not even a hour went by and it was already gone.  so disappointed. please improve that part of the formula.  this would be my favorite if it weren't for that problem.  I won't be buying again sadly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: love the smell - very elegant but doesn't last even an hour

reviews.review_title: Love the scent, but where is the lasting power?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Like others already mentioned, the scent is undetectable after less than 2 hours, which is a huge con and makes an otherwise gorgeous scent useless. Why do perfume companies do this? OK they get people's money on that first purchase, but that's where it ends. Gone are the days when people would have signature scents for years, even for life. Everything lacks lasting power these days! It doesn't matter how nice a scent might be, unless it also lasts, it's no good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: not sure about the people saying it isn't long lasting ... wore it to classes today and it lasted the entire day. could smell it perfectly on my wrists and wherever i sprayed when i got home. got a lot of compliments on the bus and around campus aswell. this scent is so comforting and i'll definitely buy more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this perfume and I bought the gift set but returned it because it has zero staying power. After about 5-10 mins you canu2019t even smell it at all. Iu2019ve seen alot of other people say the same thing. Itu2019s crazy to charge so much for perfume just to have to re apply it again after a few mins. Great smell , but Waste of money.
the smell is gone in 30 mins if that. Really sad because I love this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells so good and it lasts long depending on how much you save. It goes perfectly with the pink sol de jainero! Defo check it out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this perfume, its summery and has a nice refinement to it, but it literally vanishes after 20 minutes. Zero detection whatsoever?
Fragrance is weak; no one I've asked said they could smell anything after I've applied it. So sad because I love the scent. But I love sniffing myself :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly hate this product. It gives me an intense head ache anytime I smell it. I donu2019t understand the hype.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: PLEASE REMAKE THE FORMULA FOR THIS TO LAST LONGER. For the price you pay, youu2019d think itu2019d last all day, wouldnu2019t you? This perfumes smells so good, I was SO happy that I finally found something I liked after 10 years.  I bought it and the lasting power is SO terrible. After walking out the door, itu2019s already gone.   anything to stay.

reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much it smells absolutely amazing and last for so long it is strong which I like so that yoh can actually smell it.

I received this perfume as a gift and i love it! Itu2019s the perfect combination of fruity and floral, i love the different layers of florals. Itu2019s long lasting and you will receive plenty of compliments!

reviews.review_text: The floral notes are very powdery. Usually I don't mind that, but there's also a masculine musky barbasol undercurrent. Gardenias are gorgeous-smelling flowers. This feels like it's meant for people who've never smelled the actual flower.

reviews.review_text: I love the smell of this perfume it is worth the money if you are willing to spend it it lasts a long time if you use it wisely one spray is enough to last weeks almost as long as a boys cologne.

reviews.review_text: I was excited for this one because the bottle is pretty and itu2019s Gucci but man it smells bad way too much sweet floral that smells super cheaply. Disappointing.

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s a nice scent, but doesnu2019t last as muchu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A while ago, I was at the store looking for new fragrances, when I stumbled across this one. I tried it and instantly loved the sweet floral scent it gave off. I purchased it, and have been using it ever since. The only thing I donu2019t like about it, is that it doesnu2019t last as long as other perfumes I own. I donu2019t know how to explain it, but this perfume is good for when youu2019re inside most of the day. After going outside with it, the scent completely disappears after about an hour. It might just be me, but that has been the case for me. Other than that, I still recommend this perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would say itu2019s one of the best floral scents on the market, I usually like something a bit sweet however this is lovely, only complaint is that the longevity isnu2019t really there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this perfume has the capacity to be great for floral and patchouli lovers. The patchouli really came through on my skin and gave a musty, dirty skin smell on my skin chemistry. Minus the patchouli, this may have been a reach for me. This also smells slightly deeper and feminine-unisex leaning despite my expectations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the fragrance. Slightly costly but does seem to last all day.

Smells beautiful but does not last.  I spray 7-8 times all over and after 3 hrs canu2019t even smell on my or on my clothes.  In comparison coco mademoiselle needs 2 sprays and lasts ALL day and on  clothes the next day!2 sprays and  .    Iu2019m

reviews.review_title: If you like Patchouli, you'll like this... ud83dudc4d
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: If you like the scent of Patchouli, then you will likely enjoy this fragrance. The positives, it has staying power. The negative is that it has patchouli. I've discovered I'm not a fan. Smells like cough syrup slightly, that's what Patchouli reminds me of. Not very gardenia like. But most people seem to enjoy it. It's personal preference.

reviews.review_text: This parfum Smell Really nice and I mean it really does..... but the duration of the smell does not last long!! at all!! and honestly for the price it should really last all day long that is why I Give it 3 stars..

reviews.review_text: The perfect scent honestly! The only reason why I am giving 4 stars instead of 5 is because the scent doesnt last.

reviews.review_text: after I bought this product I broke out and my skin is now on the way to recovery. I do not recommend this product

reviews.review_text: Is this unique, youu2019ve never smelled something like this before? No. Butttt itu2019s def worth the buy. The best out of the three flora scents. Feminine, light but sexy. Something you can wear everyday or on a date. Staying power is great. A scent youu2019ll love in your collection.

reviews.review_text: So my fragrance for YEARS was Flora by Gucci and when I found they were discontinued I was so upset. I saw a review that said this was similar so I bought it. I can see why someone said it was similar but itu2019s not. It has a weird plastic smell, almost like a Barbie doll. Itu2019s very sweet and just not what I was hoping it would be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my sister for Christmas and she loved it! Smells so good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So, I wasn't sure how I was going to like this fragrance so I bought the travel size bottle. Well, it is a nice fresh scent, so, I'm gonna have to get the full bottle for my birthday this spring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This perfume smells so good a floraly! I feel this perfume stay smelling for a long time not only that but it comes in a nice size so itu2019s easy to fit into your purses!!! It is so nice I even bought it for my best friend for her birthday!

reviews.review_title: Beautiful scent, less than stellar performance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s rare to find a perfume that actually smells like gardenia.  It has a sharp and warm opening of hot brown sugar, and the white floral scent takes over after.  I adored the scent, but it fades too fast!  I canu2019t justify a repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the 2015 edition Gucci Flora. ONE of my favorite scents! I emailed Gucci from their site and they recommended this one. I trust their expertise so I went and bought it. Its not overpowering, nice floral. I love it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous, rich, long lasting scent. Iu2019d love to see an offering of matching hand and body lotion-scents last even longer when one layers them.
I love this scent. Itu2019s my newest favorite. I do wish it was less expensive though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the smell of this very much! It is very long lasting as well

reviews.review_title: Disappointed because it does not last

reviews.review_text: I am very disappointed because this fragrance, although nice, doesnu2019t last. No matter how much I apply, smell is completely gone after 15 min. Unfortunately, I cannot return this fragrance because the return period is over, but I am not satisfied with this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The scent lasted hours, smells amazing and is exactly what u was hoping it would be. Canu2019t wait for this to be my wedding scent!

reviews.review_text: I have 2 bottles and I love them! Perfect luxury everyday perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing fragrance! Lasting and unique. Reminds me of my grandmother in her younger stage of life. Reminds me that a although a mature woman we can still feel and smell beautiful.
I have the 50ml one, the smell is so bad !! it gives me headaches when I wear it, if u like sweet perfumes, i would recommend it. But, if, like me, you prefer floral scents, I wouldn't recommend it.

reviews.review_text: This is a really beautiful scent but it only lasts a couple hours at most.  Itu2019s so disappointing considering the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It smells great, fresh - like flowers in water. But it doesn't last at all. It lasts less than an hour. I can't recommend it unfortunately because of that. If they can make the formula last, it would be a perfect perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this scent so much, but doesn't last. Super annoying considering the price.

reviews.review_title: Incredible feminine, floral scent. Love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A new favorite!  Got this in a sample set, tested it thinking it would be average. Completely fell in love.  Very feminine, floral sent. Last all day, plus some. Every time I move, I catch a smell of myself and I fan girl (lol) Since wearing it I'm constantly complimented and asked what scent I'm wearing. It's such a gorgeous scent.  I will absolutely be buying a full size bottle, no questions asked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this scent, but I wish it lasted longer!! In less than 1/2 an hour itu2019s completely worn off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells beautiful but doesnu2019t last long at all :( was so excited to buy this one as I adored the scent but even cheap body sprays lasted longer. Save your money, not worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: In my opinion it lasted a few hours. Spray on each shoulder and it lasted quite a while. I defiantly prefer the purple one but this one was nice. For the first little bit it smelled like a menu2019s cologne but after that the scent was more calm and floral

Previously I received a sample of this wonderful perfume from @gucci.  Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia ud83eude77ud83eude77ud83eude77  I loved it so much that I got this one!  The three notes that make up this one are:  The head note is Italian mandarin flowers and red fruits.  The heart note:  white gardenia, jasmine absolute and frangipani flower.  The 3 note: the one that leaves behind us the sweet trail of our passage is patchouli with a note of brown sugar.  The bottle is a jewel, a delicate floral touch on a pink background with the gold-colored cap.  The formula of this perfume does not contain a UV filter  Designed with a sustainable approach, the bottle is made with 10% recycled glass using a water-based pink lacquer.  The outer packaging is made with recycled material.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this fragrance and will be purchasing a full size soon

reviews.review_title: For the price I expect more
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This scent is absolutely divine but for the price I expect it to last longer than an hour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It smells very nice but doesnu2019t last that long.  Considering the price tag of $200, I would expect it to last for an evening or so.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite perfume of all time - but they NEED TO BRING BACK the OLD BOTTLE! The glass with black top! I havenu2019t used up the last bit I have with the old bottle because I donu2019t want to trash it!  empty

reviews.review_text: Iu2019m extremely sensitive to scents but this one didnu2019t bother me at all. Itu2019s a very sweet scent, reminds me of old school Paris Hilton or Britney Spears. Scent stayed on very well and you only need a drop. Love it

reviews.review_text: GUCCI has the elegant fragrances!  I try to keep one of these in each purse; the smell put me in a peaceful place every time I smell it !  Iu2019m a Gucci Girl for life!!!

one of the best perfumes i ever had ufffcsmells so gooood!!

reviews.review_text: I love this perfume!!! it smells so amazing and I love to wear it on nights out as it has more of a strong floral scent which I personally love. If you aren't a fan of floral scents then this perfume is not for you... but if you do prefer a floral smell DO NOT HESITATE AND PURCHASE!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best perfume ever, the rollerball is quite weighted it doesnt feel cheap. Perfect for my handbag i bring it everywhere.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had two samples of this and absolutely love the smell, but it does not last more than 3-4 hours which is so disappointing and will prevent me from purchasing. I typically prefer gourmand and mature perfumes, and while this is more floral and fresh than I typically wear, there is something about it very addicting and complex.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells exactly like a bath and body works fragrance I have. not to say it doesnu2019t smell good, but Iu2019m not paying Gucci prices for B&BW scent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this purfume from one of my online orders and I cannot believe how obsessed I am with it. I got non stop compliments going out and out of all my perfumes this scent amazingly lasted throughout the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gucci Flora Gorgeous Gardenia hit my in the face... nose... with an overdose of jasmine (and some gardenia) that reminded me of the pot-pourris in cheap hotels or restaurants. Fragrance is definitely something personal, but I couldn't wait any longer to get rid of this scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample of this and immediately fell in love (please note this is as unbiased a review as possible). The perfume is perfect for spring and summer. It's a sweet floral with some freshness to it. Staying power is okay, it doesn't last longer than 4-5 hours but for me that's not a deal breaker.  I do believe if it were less sweet, it would've been better- so do avoid it if you are not into overly sweet scents.   Love the packaging as well- it looks pretty, feminine and unique. However, when you hold the bottle it's just plastic- does feel somewhat cheap for such an expensive big brand. Nevertheless, I would really recommend this for the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this perfume and immediately fell in love with it. Lasting power is better than I expected.  Unfortunately an hour later it gave me a headache so it's not for me. So even if I loved the smell I can't give it 5 stars.  If you are sensitive to smells I recommend testing it before buying full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a straight male, this is my favorite womenu2019s fragrance, by far

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I didnu2019t know if I liked it but then it became an addicting different clean richy smell. If that even makes sense. It smells good and doesnu2019t overwhelm you for all my sensitive sams out there !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this in the samples I goufffct, and it has been my favourite since then! Love how mild yet beautiful the smell is.. no words to describe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: loveeee how it smells great for special occasions,and lasts long on my skin,great for girlies that donu2019t like strong or too sweet scents

reviews.review_text: one of my favorite perfumes! Have repurchased and will over and over ud83eudd17 perfect for a daily scent

Really pretty floral on first impression, on my skin it dries down almost cologne like? The fresh delicate floral becomes a little masculine on me which is not a bad thing, but definitely a transformation from the initial first spray!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this fragrance. The feminine floral scent is exactly what I was looking for. I plan to buy a full size body eventually.
